venue.name: Jerry Remy's Sports Bar and Grill

item.description:
Chicago vs. New York

Our monthly Lunch with a twist, The Red Sox are not playing until 8:00pm, so we will be watching the White Sox beat the Yankees in an afternoon game.

Located just around the corner from Fenway (The former WBCN Building), This will be a great spot to have lunch and watch the Sox while they are playing away from home.

New members or old friends, all are welcome to join us for this new monthly event - Check out details of Jerry's New Restaurant HERE

Mmmmm...Hamburgers.

[No fees, just pay for what you eat and drink]
item.name: Monthly Lunch at Jerry Remy's
